title: Open oceans have low NPP and cover huge areas

content.question: Open oceans produce the largest share of Earthâ€™s biomass because the net primary productivity (NPP) of the oceans is

choices.label: high and thus can support a high proportion of producers
high as a result of the high concentration of nutrients in the open oceans
low, but the large expanse of the oceans supports enormous numbers of producers such as phytoplankton
low, but the individual producers found there are huge in size
low, but still higher than that of other ecosystems of the world

content.answer: low, but the large expanse of the oceans supports enormous numbers of producers such as phytoplankton

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
